title: 加了拔刀剑以后，修复大太刀的时候就崩溃了
author: 蜘蛛骑士ks

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
蜘蛛骑士ks 发表于 2019-8-11 15:06
在这里呢
https://github.com/flammpfeil/SlashBlade/issues/87
你是不是这种情况。拔刀剑更新到新版试试？

https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/slashblade/files

replies.author: 蜘蛛骑士ks
